name: Sonar (Midget_Giraffe)
description: We were given the theme of "a game where you investigate planets with monsters". The fallback was "Silence". We decided to combine these themes with a game about exploring what would have been a crashed space ship on a foreign planet while being pursued by a monster who disturbs the silence of the planet. We didn't get time to do art for the ship or to implement a story telling mechanism into the game however, so it plays without this context. Still, it was a lot of fun to make!
